name: 김**3277
quote: 글루텐프리 피자여서 다이어트 중이신 분들도 안심하고 먹을 수 있어요! 속도 편하고요!! 그리고 무엇보다 쫄깃하고 짱맛있습니당👍🏻 사장님께서도 친절하셔서 좋아요!!

name: TS **
quote: I think this was the best pizza I’ve ever had, and it’s GLUTEN FREE! It was so delicious that after finishing my dinner, I immediately ordered another one to take away. The crust, the flavors, everything was perfect. The crust… so delicious... How is it possible that’s gluten free?! The owner has celiacs, so it is for sure GF. The people who own the restaurant are very sweet and welcoming, it really added to the whole experience. Out of everything in Seoul, this pizza is what I’ll miss the most. If you’re anywhere nearby, do yourself a favor and go. You won’t regret it.

name: 이뱅*
quote: 이태리에서 공수한 재료로 피자를 만드는 곳. 정말 담백하고 도우가 쫄깃합니다. 일반 피자와 다르게 기교없이 맛으로 승부하는 곳이예요. 사장님도 너무 친절하시고 다시 방문하고 싶은 한남동 피자맛집입니다.

name: 이**
quote: 환상적인 맛의 Gluten free pizza를 맛 볼 수 있는 곳입니다. 세 종류 주문했는데 전부 맛있었어요! 특히 치즈와 토마토 소스 같은 재료가 다 신선하고 맛있고 도우를 화덕에 구워서 맛있어요! 재방문 의사 있습니다!

name: Ágoston Haj***
quote: The best gluten free pizza I ever had! The prices are a bit high but it's well worth it. The owner is nice and the head waiter is super lovely and accommodating. The place has a cool vibe with iconic Hollywood movie star visuals on the tables and walls. This is a great place to chill and eat well as part of hanging out in Itaewon.
